subject: Request for Refund - Order #SSN4201
description_text:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I am writing to formally request a refund for my order.

It has been 40 days since the purchase, and I have received absolutely no meaningful update from you, except repeated false assurances that the pedals would be shipped. In addition, you have not replied to my last three emails.

Please refund my money as soon as possible. I want to order pedals from another company, as I have already been waiting far too long. My setup has been ready for almost a month now, and the only missing part is your pedals, which have shown no sign of being shipped or delivered.

If you do not respond to this email, I will be forced to initiate legal action against your company. I have never experienced such poor service and unprofessional behavior in my life.

Kind regards,

Tahirović Damir.

conversations.body_text: Hi Damir Tahirović,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Hello, 

I hope you will be able to speed up the delivery, as quite a lot of time has passed since I placed the order and I did not receive any adequate updates on the situation. There was even some concern that I might have been scammed, considering that you were not responding.
Please let me know if there are any further delays or issues, just so I can stay informed about the situation. Once again, I hope that the pedals will arrive at your warehouse as soon as possible and then be delivered to my address.

Kind regards,
Damir.


>

Hi Damir Tahirović,    We will arrange urgent shipping via UPS for you. Should any customs duties apply, we will reimburse you for them. We apologize for any inconvenience caused!  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510436882573/trackdetails
